trans-unit.source: Defines a context that is provided to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義提供給 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: The context can be used to enable special cases of serialization or different modes of serialization.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以用來啟用特殊的序列化情況或不同的序列化模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext> interface is a specialized form of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> context, and is used as one of the input parameters for `Convert*String` / `CanConvert*String` methods of a value serializer in the same way as <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is used for context of `Convert*` / `CanConvert*` for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext>介面是一種特殊的形式<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>內容，並做為輸入參數的其中一個`Convert*String` / `CanConvert*String`方法的方式與相同值序列化程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>用於內容`Convert*` / `CanConvert*`如<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>。

trans-unit.source: Public types in WPF that implement a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> and thus use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext> for context are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Converters> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 在 WPF 中實作的公用類型<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>因此會使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext>內容中找到<xref:System.Windows.Converters>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個介面會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> associated with an object.
The descriptor of the property being converted.
trans-unit.target: 正在轉換的屬性描述元。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> for the given property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之屬性描述項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> capable of serializing the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 可以序列化指定之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value being converted.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> associated with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之型別相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" /> capable of serializing the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 可以序列化指定之型別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer" />。
